pullRequest.title: Add arg builder to listIncompleteUpload API

nodes.bodyText: We would need to sync name with API i.e. ListIncompleteUploadsArgs is more appropriate.

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
               * @return Iterable&ltResult&ltUpload&gt&gt - Lazy iterator contains object upload information.
          
          
            
               * @return Iterable<Result<Upload>> - Lazy iterator contains object upload information.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -4450,12 +4458,36 @@ public void removeAllBucketNotification(String bucketName) * @param prefix Object name starts with prefix. * @param recursive List recursively than directory structure emulation. * @return Iterable<Result<Upload>> - Lazy iterator contains object upload information. - * @see #listIncompleteUploads(String bucketName) - * @see #listIncompleteUploads(String bucketName, String prefix) + * @see #listIncompleteUploads(ListIncompleteUploadsBucketArgs args) */ + @Deprecated public Iterable> listIncompleteUploads( String bucketName, String prefix, boolean recursive) { - return listIncompleteUploads(bucketName, prefix, recursive, true); + return listIncompleteUploads( + ListIncompleteUploadsBucketArgs.builder() + .bucket(bucketName) + .prefix(prefix) + .recursive(recursive) + .build()); + } + + /** + * Lists incomplete object upload information of a bucket for prefix recursively. + * + * 
Example:{@code
+   * Iterable> results =
+   *     minioClient.listIncompleteUploads(ListIncompleteUploadsBucketArgs args);
+   * for (Result result : results) {
+   *   Upload upload = result.get();
+   *   System.out.println(upload.uploadId() + ", " + upload.objectName());
+   * }
+   * }
+ * + * @param args Arguments for listing incomplete uploads. + * @return Iterable<Result<Upload>> - Lazy iterator contains object upload information.

nodes.bodyText: Could you add all parameters like listObjects()? Similarly you could check reusing/modifying existing objectIterator class to accommodate this listing as well.

+public class ListIncompleteUploadsArgs extends BucketArgs {

commit.message: Add arg builder to listIncompleteUpload API

nodes.bodyText:
encoding-type can be set with only one option i.e. it looks boolean. We could have urlEncoding(boolean flag) would be more appropriate
As encoding-type=url is helpful to get properly encoded string of unicode/control characters in names, we could set it as default.
keyMarker cannot be ""; but can be null. You could use validateNullOrNotEmpty()
you could remove trailing/leading extra spaces at 1 and 1000
uploadIdMarker cannot be ""; but can be null. You could use validateNullOrNotEmpty()
